description:
If there was ever a time to use your voice, it’s NOW. Silence is compliance

Have the courage to be disliked
misunderstood 
different, and indifferent about it

I have accepted the fact that I am always going to ruffle some feathers in others. Perhaps I am problematic and insensitive to some. I cannot control the narrative that others feel fitting - nor do I care to

I refuse to stop questioning the world around me and stepping up to make it the best possible place to be. I will  never stop insinuating for you to do the same

Unlike most, I can’t accept this BS phrase “it’s just how it is” or “that’s  unrealistic”. I refuse to accept this ludicrous road map our generation has been conditioned to believe is the way, or even remotely fulfilling. Things are changing, there is no doubt about that - but are you doing your part?

This is the world my son is raised in, it is my responsibility as a mother to make sure he knows I did everything in my power to make his life on earth a beautiful one. Children are the light, the future, we are raising the next movers and shakers, but one undeniable truth about children, is that they lead by example

I am not out here trying to carve a new path, I am planting an entirely new forest. The world I grew up in no longer exists, but the one we are building for our future generations will be better - how are you contributing? ⚡️
